document_data.name: The Sheathed Dagger
document_data.services: Caravan services, imported silk, spices & exotic merchandise
document_data.mainbody: '''The Sheathed Dagger''' was a shop in [[Arrowmark]] that sold [[dye]]s, [[spices]], and [[silk]]s imported from [[Sembia]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. The establishment was run by [[Darnar Presnyl]], who was an agent for a trading coster based out of [[Selgaunt]].
